data.title: About Us
data.meta_description: Hello and welcome to Amy Leslie Artwork. I am Amy, an artist based in Fife, Scotland although my work has traveled the World. I create works of art in all mediums although I specialise in coloured...
data.text:
WHERE IT ALL BEGAN

I have always had a passion for art and remember my parents being extremely impressed with a drawing I had done as a child which featured figures in varying sizes to show the different distances they stood at. Having pleased them, I was eager to continue to make them proud!

Since leaving school, I have had several jobs that mostly just passed the time for me. I took myself to a local college where I passed NC in Art and Design as the Student of the Year, a great honour for me. I continued on for another year to pass my HNC in Visual Communication.

I began my artistic career thinking that illustration was were my heart lay, however, I adore animals and quickly discovered that I was good at drawing them. Coloured pencil pet portraits therefore seem to be my most popular item but I offer a whole range of artistic services including painted canvases, wall murals and book cover illustrations.

I set up my business, Amy Leslie Artwork, in April 2017 and am enjoying this new challenge daily. I continue to strive to be the best that I can be and am always looking for new challenges to improve my skills so do not hesitate to get in touch with any artistic requests.

A LITTLE ABOUT ME
